title: Ep. 17: 'The Watch' Re-up
description:
On today's inaugural re-up episode of 'The Watch,' Chris and Andy give their picks for the weekend, including 'The People v. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story,' 'The X-Files,' and Massive Attack's new EP.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
